greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The Riordan square of the permutation involutions. Triangle T(n, k), 0 <= k <= n, read by rows.
comment: The Riordan square is defined in A321620.
maple: # The function RiordanSquare is defined in A321620.
cf := proc(dim) local k, m; m := 1;
for k from dim by -1 to 1 do m := 1 - k*x - k*x^2/m od;
xref: First column are the self-inverse permutations A000085.
Row sums are A193777, alternating row sums are A000007.
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Dec 09 2018
